Sentencas: Agglomeration behavior of nickel thin films on the yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) and TiO2 doped-YSZ electrolytes under a reducing condition and at solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating temperatures was investigated by scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and scanning probe microscopy (SPM) to clarify whether this method is appropriate to investigate fundamental physicochemical properties that determine the microstructure of nickel/zirconia cermet anodes.
Titulo: Agglomeration behavior of nickel particles on YSZ and TiO2-doped YSZ electrolytes

Sentencas: Nickel agglomeration is enhanced with increasing annealing temperature and with decreasing the thickness of nickel films.
Titulo: Agglomeration behavior of nickel particles on YSZ and TiO2-doped YSZ electrolytes

Sentencas: Nickel agglomeration behavior was found to be essentially the same between YSZ and TiO2-doped YSZ electrolytes, forming small nickel particles with average diameter of less than 550 nm.
Titulo: Agglomeration behavior of nickel particles on YSZ and TiO2-doped YSZ electrolytes

Sentencas: Nonetheless, the effect by TiO2 doping to YSZ appeared for larger nickel particles formed due to enhancement in wettability of nickel metal on the electrolyte.
Titulo: Agglomeration behavior of nickel particles on YSZ and TiO2-doped YSZ electrolytes

Sentencas: It is demonstrated that the present method is actually an useful and powerful tool to investigate fundamental physicochemical properties in metal/oxide systems.
Titulo: Agglomeration behavior of nickel particles on YSZ and TiO2-doped YSZ electrolytes
Agglomeration behavior of nickel particles on YSZ and TiO2-doped YSZ electrolytes
